attributes.action: Reopen the email facility to the Prime Minister on the 10 Downing Street website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the email facility on the 10 Downing Street website is reinstated, to allow ordinary citizens to send emails to the Prime Minister without having to resort to "YouTube". This facility is part of the "open government" which is so necessary.

rejection.details: The email facility has been removed temporarily for essential work. There are a variety of channels that you can use to contact the Prime Minister as refered to on http://www.number10.gov.uk/output/Page3.asp and http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
